name: Quantum Veil
description:
Infiltrate the enemy facility and get to the end of the three stages.

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys or by using a Gamepad

Credits
  • This game uses these sounds from freesound:
    • "Metal Gear Solid Inspired Alert Surprise SFX" by djlprojects (https://freesound.org/people/djlprojects)
  • Ingame Font: Tom Thumb by Robey Pointer (https://robey.lag.net/2010/01/23/tiny-monospace-font.html)
  • Music by 42Kwei on Soundcloud
